text: Georgina Rodríguez celebrated turning 24 this Saturday, January 28 in a fabulous way. The Spanish model, who recently welcomed a baby girl with boyfriend Cristiano Ronaldo, took to social media to give glimpses of her incredible day. As seen in her Instagram posts, Georgina threw a party with her friends, got glammed up by a stylist and even spent some time with the kids. There was only one notable absence from the special day : Cristiano! The 32 - year - old Real Madrid player could not be with his love as he was in Valencia playing the home team.
